name: SliceGo
description:
Slice Go

Slice Go is a super addictive slicing puzzle game with clear graphics and challenging levels. All you need to do is to slice on a board and cut it into a smaller scale which can finally trap the bouncing balls. The shapes of boards and balls will become challenging from easier levels to harder ones. And you will be highly engaged with the puzzles and quickly addicted to it! 😃


😎 ADDICTIVE SLICING PUZZLES 😎

- Try to slice on the board and trap the balls with a smaller scale, if you can finish the puzzles with fewer slices, you will get higher stars and coins with more points. Also, you can increase your slicing skills by restarting the puzzles to reach your best records.

💪 INCREASE YOUR REACTION CAPABILITY 💪

- In order to pass all the levels, especially the harder ones, you should make decisions and strategies quickly enough to find the perfect timing. And this will help you to improve your patience and reaction capability.

🔥 HUNDREDS OF CHALLENGING LEVELS 🔥

- You will get 1-3 stars after passing each level, and stages will be unlocked when you get certain stars. The higher levels you reach, the more difficult challenges you will find. Hundreds of levels are waiting for you to enjoy. (More levels are on the go.)

👌 WELL-DESIGNED SHAPES OF BOARDS/BALLS 👌

- There are hundreds of well-designed boards for each level, and the shapes of balls are also varied from level to level. Obstacles on the boards and the non-stop changing balls will totally inspire your gaming spirit to pass all the levels.

✨ DIFFERENT KINDS OF HELPFUL ITEMS ✨

- If you get stuck, you can choose 4 items(Guard, Bomb, FireSlade, and Sandglass) below the screen for help. Also, if you make great/perfect slices, there will be some special items like Extra Coins, Sandglass, Transform, Guard or Bomb.


HOW TO PLAY:
- Slice the board and keep all the balls in the same sliced area.
- Slice the board without touching any balls.
- Slice the board without touching any other obstacles.


Are you ready to spend your time to enjoy this super fun and addictive game?
Download it for FREE and become the expert of slicing now!
Let's Slice, let's Go! 🏃🏃🏃
